name: Halo: CE Anniversary
description: Halo: Combat Anniversary edition is the 10 year anniversary remaster of the original Halo: CE

name: Halo 4
description: Halo 4 is the 4th installation of the Halo series that follows the adventures of the Master Chief

name: Halo: Spartan Assault
description: Halo: Spartan Assault is a Top down, two stick shooter...

name: Halo: Master Chief Collection
description: Halo: Master Chief Collection is a re-release of Halo: CE, Halo 2, Halo 3 and Halo 4 for Xbox One and Xbox 360

name: Halo: Spartan Strike
description: Halo: Spartan Strike is a Two-Stick Shooter that was released on Windows Phone, Microsoft Windows and iOS

name: Halo 5: Guardians
description: Halo 5: Guardians, is the latest game of the Halo series that sticks with the journey of The Master Chief

name: Halo Wars 2
description: Halo Wars 2 is the sequel to the successful real time strategy game Halo Wars
